page.title: 13The Emergency Services.
page.content: If anyone needs medical attention a helicopter from R.A.F.Chivenor will fly them to the North Devon Hospital. In the event of a fire they are able to dispatch a fire-fighting package. The helicopter can reach Lundy within 20 minutes.There are plenty of fire extinguishers and in the event of a fire all the residents would turn out to help fight it.Likewise all the residents are Auxiliary Coastguards and they regularly have practice sessions-sometimes with helicopters and instruction in cliff rescue techniques by the Hartland Point Coastguard.12 members of the team were involved in rescuing the 7 crew of the Kaaksburg which ran aground off No.4 Quarry on the eastern side in November 1980. There used to be an agent who would warn Lloyd's in bad weather.
